comments.body: Nice catch!
Will this ever be `$ENV{ROOTSYS}/lib64`, leaving a `64` in the `PATH`?
Answer: Not if you source `thisroot.sh`, but with `-Dgnuinstall=ON -DCMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR=lib64`, `thisroot.sh` won't work it seems.
But if you do this then there shouldn't be any `thisroot.sh`? Anyway - is this something that must be fixed for this PR? ;-)

No, this is not something to be fixed in this PR. It's just that `thisroot.sh` is installed with `make install`, so in principle that could happen when sourcing after installing. But I don't think anyone is actually customizing ROOT's installation dirs, so it's something that can be fixed as part of [ROOT-8589](https://sft.its.cern.ch/jira/browse/ROOT-8589).
